title: Wild Australasia (A)
creator_credit: BBC, ABC-TV (Australia), Animal Planet and Neil Nightingale
brief_description: Wonderful aerial photography of the Australian landscape entices the viewer to voyage with the filmmakers across the continent. A six part television series on wildlife co-produced by the BBC/ABC and narrated by Matt Day. Landscapes, flora and fauna of Australia and parts of New Zealand are explored. Deserts, coral reefs, islands, forests and cities and the unique nature of wildlife in Australasia are portrayed in great, colourful detail. Extras include two bonus documentaries on penguins and possums.
